## Impact Assessment

### Change Type
- [ ] **Patch** (typos, grammar, formatting) - No re-ratification needed
- [ ] **Minor** (clarifications, commentary) - Optional notification
- [ ] **Major** (new/modified articles) - Re-ratification required
- [ ] **Breaking** (core principle changes) - Re-ratification + explicit consent required
